“Of course! It all makes perfect sense. That's why
my old star charts are useless. Every star in the sky
here is different!”

"Take this magical stone. You'll need it to keep up
with me!"
bodyText:
BREAK APART: When you play this character, you
may banish one of your items to give chosen
character +2 {s} this turn.

flavorText:
"Move, move, move! There's no time to explain.
Well, maybe a little time, so listen up..."
bodyText:
LET'S GET THIS SHOW ON THE ROAD: {e} - Chosen
character gains Rush this turn. (They can
challenge the turn they're played.)

flavorText:
"You were so focused on me and Mulan that you forgot

bodyText:
AT HER SIDE: While you have 2 or more other exerted
characters in play, this character gets +2 {l}.

"What are we guarding the kitchen for, Napoleon?
There ain't no scarabs 'round here. Call me when
there's somethin’ serious that needs fixin'."

"Say hello to Figaro. Up to mischief already!"
-Geppetto
bodyText: PLAYFULNESS: Opposing items enter play exerted.

"C'mon! Let's show that mean old high sultan

bodyText:
YOU CAN DO IT!: {e} - Chosen character gets +3 {s}
this turn.

"Let's burn rubber, kid!"
-Wreck-It Ralph
bodyText:

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge

PAY ATTENTION Whenever you play a character with
5 {s} or more, you may exert them to gain 2 lore.

3 or more actions this turn, you may play this
character for free.
RAAAWR! When you play this character, ready
chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of

bodyText:
ALL FOR ME: {e}, Banish one of your items -

SACREBLEU! Whenever one of your items is

Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge

BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains
Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

characters.

Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your

"You can't do this to me, you swindler! We had a

DOUBLE-CROSSING CROOK!: During your turn, when

name: Friend Owl - Cantankerous Neighbor

"Sand? In the forest? I'll bet some magical
miscreant's up to no good. Well, it's none of my
concern. I'm going back to bed."

bodyText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can
challenge this character.)
PRECOCIOUS FRIEND While you have a character
in play with more {s} than each opposing

HELP! HELP!: Whenever an opponent plays a

name: Nothing We Won't Do

Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your
teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may
{e} to sing this song for free.)
Ready all your characters. For the rest of this turn,
they take no damage from challenges and can't quest.

name: Get Out!
flavorText:
"Leave now. Before I change my mind."

bodyText:
Banish chosen character, then return an item card

Deal 1 damage to chosen character for each exerted
character you have in play.

flavorText:
A mysterious phenomenon that makes you feel both
invincible and vulnerable at the same time.
bodyText:
Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next
turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

name: Most Everyone's Mad Here
flavorText:
"Well, some go this way, some go that way. But as for
me, myself, personally, I prefer the shortcut."
bodyText:
Gain lore equal to the damage on chosen character,
then banish them.

flavorText:
"I know what this means to you."
-The Emperor
bodyText:
WORTHY WEAPON: {e}, {e} one of your characters -
Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest

name: The Mouse Queen - Ruler of Mousedom

"After that dreadful Ratigan business, I know
about villains. This Jafar is certainly a villain of the
highest order."

CODE OF HONOR: Whenever this character quests,

(Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to
another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

I'LL TAKE CARE OF YOU When you play this

Resist +1 until the start of your next turn.
(Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

"It began with two sisters. One born with magical
powers, and one born powerless. Their love of

ENDLESS TALE: When you play this character,
chosen opposing character gets -1 {s} this turn.

WE CAN DO THIS TOGETHER: When you play this

"Okay, so the plan is 'leave Wasabi to watch our

Support (Whenever this character quests, you
may add their {s} to another chosen character's
{s} this turn.)

deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

I HAVE JUST THE THING! {e}, Choose and discard

flavorText:
"Now, don't fret over the mess, love. We'll have

bodyText: CLEAN UP: {e}, Banish one of your items - Draw a card.

JUST WHAT YOU NEED: When you play this

Ward (Opponents can't choose this character

"Do you want to be all muscle and no brain?"

GO DOWN THERE AND INVESTIGATE: When you play

ALWAYS PLANNING Whenever this character quests,

(A character with cost 6 or more can {e} to sing this

Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a

If it's a Puppy character card, you may reveal it and put it into

Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell
facedown and exerted.

If you have no cards in your hand, draw until you have

Sing Together 7 (Any number of your or your

flavorText: He's even tougher than he looks.
bodyText: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

name: Chi-Fu - Imperial Advisor
flavorText: "You there! Keep that fighting away from here! It is imperative that I write to the Emperor."
bodyText: Overly Cautious: While this character has no damage, he gets +2{l}.

name: Chien-Po - Imperial Soldier
bodyText: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Donald Duck - Buccaneer
flavorText: Nobody stands a change against the daring duck of the high seas!
bodyText: Boarding Party: During your turn, whenever this character banishes a character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 {l} this turn.

name: Hercules - Beloved Hero
bodyText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges on of your characters must chose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1)

name: Lefou - Opportunistic Flunky
bodyText: I Learned From the Best: During your turn, you may play this character for free if an opposing character was banished in a challenge this turn.

name: Li Shang - Imperial Captain
flavorText: Immovable as a mountain and fierce as a dragon- the Empire's finest warrior.

name: Ling - Imperial Soldier
flavorText: A good friend is handy in a fight.
bodyText: Full of Spirit: Your Hero characters get +1{s}.

name: Luisa Madrigal - Rock of the Family
flavorText: There's no way Ursula's creatures are getting to that donkey.
bodyText: I'm the Strong One: While you have another character in play, this character gets +2{s}.

name: Magic Broom - Aerial Cleaner
flavorText: It spends its days keeping the treasured glimmers in the Hall of Lorcana sparkling clean.
bodyText: Winged for a Day: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Magic Broom - Brigade Commander
bodyText:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Army of Brooms: This character gets +2{s} for each other character named Magic Broom you have in play

name: Mickey Mouse - Playful Sorcerer
bodyText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Sweep Away: When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

name: Mickey Mouse - Standard Bearer
flavorText: He set the standard for intrepid adventurers everywhere.
bodyText: Stand Strong: When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They gain +2{s} while challenging.)

name: Mulan - Armored Fighter
flavorText: "Maybe what I really wanted was to prove I could do things right, so when I looked in a mirror, I'd see someone worthwhile."

name: Philoctetes - No-Nonsense Instructor
bodyText:
You Gotta Stay Focused: Your Hero characters gain Challenger +1 (They get +1{s} while challenging)
Shameless Promoter: Whenever you play a Hero character, gain 1 lore.

name: Piglet - Sturdy Swordsman
bodyText:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Not So Small Anymore: While you have no cards in your hand, this character can challenge ready characters.

name: Rajah - Royal Protector
flavorText: As regal as his namesake and just as powerful
bodyText: Steady Gaze: While you have no cards in your hand, characters with cost 4 or less can't  challenge this character.

name: Raya - Unstoppable Force
bodyText:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2{s}.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
You Gave it Your Best: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

name: Yao - Imperial Soldier
flavorText: "I'm gonna hit you so hard, it'll make your ancestors dizzy."
bodyText: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2{s})

name: Avalanche
flavorText: A little snow never hurt anyone. A big rock however
bodyText: Deal 1 damage to each opposing character. You may banish chosen location.

name: I Find 'Em, I Flatten 'Em
flavorText:
I don't ask how hard the work is
Got a rough, indestructible surface
bodyText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Banish all items.

name: One Last Hope
bodyText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. If a Hero character is chosen, they may also challenge ready character this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: The Mob Song
bodyText:
Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may {e} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 3 damage to up to 3 chosen characters and/or locations.

name: Triton's Decree
flavorText: "Ursula's foul creatures are not welcome in my kingdom!"
bodyText: Each opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 2 damage to them.

name: Fortisphere
bodyText:
Resourceful: When you play this item, you may draw a card.
Extract of Steel: 1{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character of yours gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Imperial Bow
bodyText: Within Range: {e}, 1{i} - Chosen Hero character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive this turn. (They get +2{s} while challenging . They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: RLS Legacy's Cannon
flavorText:
"So help me, I'll use the ship's cannons to blast ya all to the kingdom come!"
 -John Silver
bodyText: BA-BOOM!: {e}, 2{i}, Discard a card - Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location.

name: The Wall - Border Fortress
bodyText: Protect The Realm: While you have an exerted character here, your other locations can't be challenged.

name: Thebes - The Big Olive
bodyText: If You Can Make it Here: During your turn, whenever a character banishes another character in a challenge while here, gain 2 lore.
